resources.string: Whiskers is trying to pick the best lemons for the lemonade. She\'s too small so pick them for her by clicking the photo.
Wiggles seems to be disturbed by the idea of her doing any work. Click the image %1$d times to milk them juicy lemons for her.
Sushi is enjoying roasting in the sun. Click to ensure she stays hydrated with that fresh lemonade.
Muffin is not happy all the lemonade is gone. Tap the image to make some more before she murders you in your sleep.
